scripts.init: ORIGIN=$(git remote get-url origin 2>/dev/null); if [ "$ORIGIN" = "https://github.com/ObjectiveAI/objectiveai-function-sandbox" ]; then rm -rf .git && rm -rf objectiveai && git init && git submodule add https://github.com/ObjectiveAI/objectiveai objectiveai && git submodule update --init --recursive && git add . && git commit -m "Initial commit"; fi && npm install && (test -f examples/examples.json || ts-node init.ts)
scripts.build-final: git -C objectiveai checkout . && npm run build
